comment.author: 79424081@N08
comment._content: This is Howard Daniel Hercus Showalter (1882-1969), who generally went by H.D.H. Showalter.  He was a lifetime member at Trissels Church in Broadway.

comment.author: 52529054@N06
comment._content: Thank you so much for taking time to provide the full name of the person on the photograph. This is very helpful!
